title: Safety in the mountains: bushcraft
creator_credit: Grahame MacFarlane, New Zealand National Film Unit and John Cooper
brief_description: The organisation of a bushwalking trip, showing the choice of equipment and its packing, food and clothing, ways to cross a river, building fires, marking a trail, handling firearms and other examples of bushcraft.
creator_credit_for_label: Grahame MacFarlane, New Zealand National Film Unit and John Cooper
description: The organisation of a bushwalking trip, showing the choice of equipment and its packing, food and clothing, ways to cross a river, building fires, marking a trail, handling firearms and other examples of bushcraft.
